note: Hi Everyone! John Simmerman here with Active Towns - I'm an Austin, TX based urbanist, active mobility advocate, and health promotion professional producing video content and a podcast that profiles the people, places, and programs promoting a Culture of Activity for All Ages & Abilities and celebrating the simple fact that Streets Are For People. To follow along please subscribe to my Active Towns YouTube Channel.
